body:
The current solution makes use of the `Gem::LoadError` raised by the adapters to provide two separate error messages:

1. adapter file can't be found: `could not load 'active_record/connection_adapters/postgres_adapter'. Make sure that the adapter in your database.yml is valid. If you use an adapter other than mysql, mysql2, postgres or sqlite3 add the necessary adapter gem to your Gemfile.`
1. adapter file was found but missing dependencies prevent it from being loaded: `to use the postgres adapter you need to add: gem 'pg' to your Gemfile.`

@schneems what kind of output would you like to see? I think the wording could be improved. Also what other places do you see to adress the issue?
